casebody.data:
99-0486 (La. 4/1/99)

Emma Lou BROUSSARD v. WAL-MART STORES, INC. and Randy Broussard. No. 99-C-0486. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Wal-Mart Stores Inc.; Broussard, Randy; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Acadia 15th Judicial District Court Div. “D” Number 70057; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-1813

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J. not on panel. MARCUS, VICTORY, and TRAYLOR, JJ. would grant the writ.
